properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the Character.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the Character with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the Characters within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The Character, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Character, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The Character, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Character, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first Character in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last Character in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle Character in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the Character with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the Character that follows the desired Character.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the Character whose index follows the specified Character in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The Character whose index comes before the desired Character.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any Character in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every Character in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Character.
Returns the Character with the specified index.
